Posts.Content: Feb 1, 2008 04:38PM ska1951 wrote: I really hope when that phonecall comes that you hear nothing but good news.  I am holding your hand tight!!!!! I had a core needle biopsy this past Tuesday.  My surgeon said he would not call me as he preferred to deliver the news...good OR bad...in person.  I will see him on the 5th at 3:00.  Meanwhile, I am battling strep throat and a sinus infection!  Glad it is the weekend. Sheila/Kansas
Posts.Title: been here.. done that and now I am back dobiew2 LiveForToday
